snippet: The German media giant will buy most of the publishing assets of Primary Wave, and they will form a joint venture to release and market new recordings.
abstract: German media giant Bertelsmann will buy most publishing assets of Primary Wave for $150 million, and they will form a joint venture to release and market new recordings.
lead_paragraph: The German media giant will buy most of the publishing assets of Primary Wave, and they will form a joint venture to release and market new recordings.

headline.main: Bertelsmann Joins Venture for New Music by Established Acts
headline.print_headline: Bertelsmann Joins Venture for New Music by Established Acts
